name: Locating a customer using badly formatted criteria

testSteps.description: [1] {search-criteria=phoneNumberPrefix, phoneNumber, value1="86", value2="334", notes=Phone number must have at least 7 digits}

children.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
When I locate a customer by phoneNumberPrefix, phoneNumber using "86", "334"
Locate by criteria: [phoneNumberPrefix=86,phoneNumber=334]
Then the search should fail with an invalid-search-criteria error
Check field validation error: ,

testSteps.description: [1] {search-criteria=registrationNumber, value1="0863456", value2=, notes=Reg number must have 8 digits}

children.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
When I locate a customer by registrationNumber using "0863456",
Locate by criteria: [regNumber=0863456]
Then the search should fail with an invalid-search-criteria error
Check field validation error: ,

testSteps.description: [1] {search-criteria=cardNumber,cardType, value1="086345", value2="Visa Debit Card", notes=Card number must have 8 digits}

children.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
When I locate a customer by cardNumber,cardType using "086345", "Visa Debit Card"
Locate by criteria: [cardNumber=086345,cardType=Visa Debit Card]
Then the search should fail with an invalid-search-criteria error
Check field validation error: ,

testSteps.description: [1] {search-criteria=customerName,dateOfBirth, value1="A", value2="1975-10-10", notes=Customer name must have at least 3 letters(?)}

children.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
When I locate a customer by customerName,dateOfBirth using "A", "1975-10-10"
Locate by criteria: [name=A,dateOfBirth=Fri Oct 10 00:00:00 BST 1975]
Then the search should fail with an invalid-search-criteria error
Check field validation error: ,

testSteps.description: [1] {search-criteria=customerName,dateOfBirth, value1="AB1", value2="1975-10-10", notes=Customer name must be alpha-numeric}

children.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
When I locate a customer by customerName,dateOfBirth using "AB1", "1975-10-10"
Locate by criteria: [name=AB1,dateOfBirth=Fri Oct 10 00:00:00 BST 1975]
Then the search should fail with an invalid-search-criteria error
Check field validation error: ,

userStory.storyName: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number
userStory.narrative:
In order to find information relevant to a specific customer,as an S&A working on a tablet, 
I want to be able to locate a customer by either: registration number, phone number, card number or
by a combination of name and date of birth.

title: Locating a customer using badly formatted criteria

tags.name: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number

values: Phone number must have at least 7 digits
Customer name must have at least 3 letters(?)
